text: namut (ohuge paramparave daruvan vana mema arabivarun nam, tamange piya vana ibrahimge honda ovadan amataka kara, piliru aradhanavehi yedunaha. ese tibiyadi) movun veta (mema dharmaya vana) satyayada, pæhædili (mage mema) dutayada pæminena turu movunvada, movunge mutun mittanvada, (danduvam nokara melovadi) suvaya vindina lesatama ma athæra dæmuvemi
